description: Initial primes of Cunningham chains of first type with length exactly 3. Primes in A059453 which survive as primes just two "2p+1 iterations", forming chains of exactly 3 terms.
links: W. Roonguthai, Yves Gallot's Proth.exe and Cunningham Chains
example: 41 is here because 20 and 325 are composites,41,83,167 are primes.
mathematica: ipccQ[n_]:=Module[{c=(n-1)/2},PrimeQ[NestList[2#+1&,c,4]]=={False, True, True, True, False}]; Select[Prime[Range[2000]],ipccQ] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 10 2014 *)
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 20 2001
